trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kihei
There were no other sightings in Kihei on or around October 10th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi had gone outside with my video camera at night. i saw nothing at the time but later, after viewing my video, i saw and heard something that flashed quickly on my screen. i freeze framed it and what i saw i couldn't explain. these orbs sort of flashed down and then reversed directions. there were two clusters of about six or so, both in semi-circle formations. the orbs glow red, orange and yellow, as you can see on this photo i've posted on myspace http:\\viewmorepics.myspace.com\index.cfm?fuseaction=viewimage&friendid=255911914&albumid=919638&imageid=12286337 here is a shortened clip that i made by revideo taping that segment. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=rfjsw569ksa i would guess them to have only been about 10 feet away from me, so they were rather small in comparison to the ufp's of similar descriptions. i would also like to add that when i moved the photo on the orbs on "my documents" a strange thing also happened. the black around these orbs turned white. i don't understand how that could have happened either. here's the link. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=u1mxorj_8iq
Summary: Two clusters of orbs appeared on video taken outside my home, in close range. They then jump back the opposite direction, making a clicking sound as they do.
